title: Professional licenses (medical, legal, engineering, teaching)
dataVerified: Licensee name, license number, profession/specialization, issue date, expiration date, issuing jurisdiction
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Photo (when verified, for licenses with photos). Revocation status (ACTIVE, SUSPENDED, REVOKED). Disciplinary action date (if applicable). Link to state licensing board system (public and enforcement officials, requires login for enforcement details)
rationale: Prevents practice with revoked licenses. Instant verification by employers, patients, clients. Domain binding to state licensing boards. Wallet card format with OCR-to-hash reduces need to carry physical license while maintaining verification capability.
